SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Whoa, what's this!? They're like the
visions I see at the end of my waves,
but there are so MANY!

SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Viewing just one or two visions uses a
considerable amount of magical energy,
so what sort of person could possibly
watch this many at once!?

SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I sense power coming from that
chair. I should take a look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Why, if it isn't Ameya Aisling.
What brings you to Providence?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Are all these visions yours?
Also, who are you? Also also,
how do you know who I am?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.text:
My, but you do enjoy asking questions!
Or perhaps you merely take some
special interest in me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.text:
I mean, I'm curious about you, sure—
but mostly I'm wondering about my cat.
I'm guessing it has to be inside one
of these visions, right?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Perceptive as ever, I see. But of course,
discovering visions is your special power,
Ameya Aisling.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Hope that's permission to start sifting
through all of these, because that's
what I'm about to do!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Sift away, young witch—because I cannot
wait to see if finding the cat you seek
will truly be so easy as all that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.text:
All is as I told you, no? Finding a cat
is not so simple a matter here—or perhaps
you have merely discovered the joys of
watching all these visions instead?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so long as I know there's a cat
in one of these things, I don't mind
taking my time with it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Then please, watch all you desire—
for that is surely why you were
guided to this place. Heh heh.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Man, what is your deal? I can't read your face,
and half the time I can't even tell what you're 
talking about. It's starting to creep me out.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Getting flustered that we still haven't
found that cat, are we? Well, don't worry—
there should be opportunity soon enough.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Wrong! Not flustered at all! I'm actually
enjoying this opportunity to experiment
with Macha's power and figure out how
to best make use of the visions here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.text:
I fear I do not know what you mean,
Ameya Aisling. As someone who merely
observes, the concept of 'making use'
of a vision has never occurred to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.text: So you've just been sitting and watching all these visions without doing anything? C'mon! What's even the point of that?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.text: That is the question, isn't it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.text:
This is where you die,
Ameya Aisling.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.text:
You should have departed the moment
you found your cat, yet you chose
to continue watching visions. So now you can bear witness to your
last and final vision—for your fate
has already been sealed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.text:
So it would have been smarter to leave?
Wrong! Coming here let me see your visions
for the first time—it's what I do AFTER
this that's going to change my fate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.text:
How absurd. Your final moments might
play out in various ways, but the end
result ever remains the same. I have watched this vision time and time
again, Ameya Aisling; your fate was set
the moment you arrived in Providence.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_00.text:
I guess refusing to defy fate is,
like, your thing? That's just sad. Well, I'm not the meek little lamb you are,
so do me a favor and stop trying to decide
my destiny for me, 'kay?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.text:
Guess that wasn't my fate after all.
So sorry to disappoint!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.text:
Are you truly claiming you can
reverse even your own visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.text: I mean, yes? They're my visions, so why wouldn't I be able to change them? Look, if you don't get discouraged, you can keep trying to change something until you get it right. At least, that's what I'm choosing to do with these visions.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.text: But at some point you will have to confront the fate of the worlds, for the overturning of a destiny always comes at great cost. So I will continue watching you, Ameya Aisling—for I wish to see the surprise on your face when that bill finally comes due.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_000_CUT_01.text:
Ew, what a creeper thing to say!
That is seriously messed up. But hey, I can't stop you, so watch
your little creeper heart out. Byeee!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_010_CUT_01.text:
I envied you, Ameya Aisling—and even
thought you might finally be the one
to change the way I live. And it turns out I was correct: I meddled
in a vision for the first and last time,
and used it to guide your wave to
this very door.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_010_CUT_01.text:
I have been watching you for ages,
and know you possess countless futures. So do not worry, Ameya Aisling!
Instead, believe in your waves
and keep moving ever forward.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_010_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_010_CUT_01.text: You called me here to make you stop? Even to the end, you can't stop putting your fate in the hands of others.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
Guess this ends with you not having
to see those visions anymore, eh?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
Is this how you've always gone
about things, Ameya Aisling?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
Pretty much! I win some and lose some,
but I always keep moving forward.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
You know, this could also change YOUR future—
but I'm getting the sense your destiny
doesn't belong to you alone.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
Perhaps not. I cannot allow myself to
follow only your destiny, Ameya Aisling,
for the visions I see are legion.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
So who are you, anyway? I mean,
you're not, like, a god or anything, right?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
If creating the world makes one a 'god,'
then I do not qualify. I simply watch,
as I shall continue to do until the
Conjoined Worlds meet their end.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
Well then, from time to time you can go ahead
and peek in on your old fave Ameya Aisling
just for old time's sake. Now byeee!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_AMYA_020_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I will be watching you until
the bitter end, Ameya Aisling.

SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
Is this Macha's magic? ...Wait, no.
None of these visions are connected
to me by the green lines.

SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_WRLD_AMYA_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
So these visions aren't mine at all.
They belong to other people.

SUB_W14_SCAN_AMYA_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_SCAN_AMYA_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.text:
Oh hey, there's a chair here.
I should take a closer look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What is a chair doing
in a place like this?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_020.text: Uh, what are you supposed to be?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I am... Well, you may
call me the Observer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Ah, okay. I guess you use these visions
to look at all sorts of different worlds,
which is how you know who I am.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
My visions can intrude into any world at
any time, projecting to me those whose
lives totter in the vicissitudes of fate.
I behold them without pause. Such is my fate.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Wait, so you just sit here and observe?
What's the point in that?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_070.text:
There is no need to bring concepts such
as meaning into this. None can defy fate—
not even those who appear within my visions. And this is well and good, for the fates
of strangers have nothing to do with me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_080.text:
How can you claim people can't defy fate
when you never even bother to try?
I mean, your choices could change
a TON of these peoples' fates!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_090.text:
I thought you might say that. So come, then!
Sit in this chair. Doing so will grant you the
ability to meddle in my visions and alter
all the fates you like.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_CHAIR_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Clearly you saw that coming, too—but I
don't care, because this is gonna be fun. Watch and learn, man! I'm gonna show you
just how easy it is to change fate!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Well, everyone in town is on the brink
of starvation, so I've no choice but to
protect this food with my very life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
I don't know who you are,
but I owe you big time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Never mind him, beasties!
You got Ameya to deal with now!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
I can't die now! I have to get
these medicinal plants back to
my sick little sister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Hey, you're the woman who saved me the
other day! Thank you again! I owe you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Bring it on, chumps!
I'm ready for you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Where the hell is the bomb disposal unit!?
This thing's about to blow, and we'll
never get the civvies out in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
About damn time, bomb lady! Get over
here and stop that detonator already!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Sure thing! Er, but this is my first time
disarming a bomb, so if you have any
tips or whatever, I'm all ears.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
The detonator has chips of three colors:
red, blue, and yellow. If you put 'em back
in their original order, it stops the timer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, that sounds easy enough!
So what was the original order?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I can't remember it clearly, but I don't
think any of the chips were in the same
position as they are now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Uh, I think the blue chip was somewhere
to the right of the red chip?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
There are three chips here: red, blue,
and yellow, and we need to put them
back in their original order if we
want to disarm the bomb. The original order had all three chips in
different positions than they're in now,
and the blue chip was somewhere to the
right of the red one. Okay, cool.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
Thank you so much. You have no idea
how many lives you saved today.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Everyone, please remain calm! There's a whole
herd of fiends out there, but we'll be safe
so long as we stay in this shelter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my cat!?
I don't see Lady Purrs-A-Lot anywhere,
and I'm afraid she may have run outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
No, ma'am, I haven't seen your cat,
and I'm afraid I can't let you outside.
Now please just sit down and be calm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Nooo! Lady Purrs-A-Lot!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ma'am, what are you doing!?
Do NOT go outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey, were you not listening?
There's fiends out there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
My sweet little kitty might be outside!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Okay, fine! But I'm going with you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: I bet she's in here somewhere. Let me help you look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: No, you idiot! Don't open the door!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Well, I suppose it's possible that she's still around here, but I've been searching for quite a while now...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Gah! They've broken down the door!
We got fiends incoming, people!
Run for your lives!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
Phew! I think that's the last of them.
Now let's find that cat!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
Hm? Are you still with me,
mildly eccentric cat lady?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Lady Purrs-A-Lot! There you are!
Oh, Mama has been so worried!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Oh, I'm so glad that you found her!
Wish I could find MY cat so easily...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text: Thank you, young lady. Thank you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
It's been over 10 days since I entered this
sweltering jungle in search of the legendary
Great Beast. My provisions have run out,
and I've now become thoroughly lost. Yes, this may well be
the place I die...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The Great Beast! I've found it at last!
I must catch it immediately!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The only thing you'll be catching
is a lethal blow to the head.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heavens, there's someone else out here!?
Who are you, girl, and why have you... No, that doesn't matter. I have staked my
very life on capturing the Great Beast,
so I suggest you stay out of my way!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You're asking ME to
stay out of YOUR way?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You see? There's no way you can take a
powerhouse of a beast like that alive.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You fool! You thrice-damned fool!
I came here to CAPTURE the beast,
and you've gone and SLAIN it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
And I ALSO saved you from
ending up a bloody footprint!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
My beast... Give me back
my precious beast!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I feel quite certain the lost treasure of the
Empire is concealed deep within these tunnels,
but I've no idea which fork to take.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
You there! You look like quite
the intuitive young lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Uh, do you mean me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Which fork would you choose?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Hmm. Let's see...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Gotta be the left fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Definitely the middle one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Right fork for sure!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Then I shall defer to your
great wisdom. Tally-ho!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: And a big tally-ho to you, too.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Another fork. Which way this time,
my fine adventuring friend!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Hmm. Let's see...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The left fork is calling out to me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: LOVE the vibes from the middle fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The right fork feels right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Very well. We shall proceed thusly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Does he not understand that he's the professional here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Oh, look! Three treasure chests!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Eureka! This is, without a doubt,
the lost treasure of the Empire! But according to the literature,
only one chest holds what we seek,
while the others are but fiendish traps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden path will guide you
to the treasure.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden paths hide traps.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Well, friend? Which do you believe
to be the real treasure?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You sure you want to ask me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden path will guide
you to the treasure,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden paths hide
traps,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: I'm feeling that chest on the left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Gotta go for that middle chest.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: I'm all about that chest on the right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Huzzah! Nothing to
do now but open it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Oh yeah! NAILED it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
The lost treasure of the Empire
is mine at last!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Your judgment has served me well,
my good lady. Thank you so much!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Glad I could help!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Aw, boo! It's empty! Er, but what's this written
on the bottom here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The punishment for thievery is death'?
...Oh boy, that's not good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Earthquake!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
It's a trap—the tunnels are collapsing!
Run for it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You'll never make it in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: BWAAAAAAH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm involved in the preservation of the
wild bird population, and am currently
investigating how many have returned
to these woods due to our efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, there's a real big one flying
this way! Guess that makes 274?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Sweet feathers, that's no bird!
It's a fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text:
With that fiend gone, even more wild birds
will now return to our magnificent forests.
You've done a great service to all of our
winged friends this day!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I am indeed, for an accurate survey of the
bird population is a necessary component
of our environmental-protection efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
966. ...No, wait. That was a fiend.
It doesn't count.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and the one before that was a fiend
as well, so let's exclude that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and there are four
more birds over there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! I see six birds there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
And that makes... Goodness, I've lost
track. Where is the count at now?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, yes. Thank you. One must always
have an accurate count, after all!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, looks like the fiends scattered,
so I think Birdman here should be okay.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Er, are you certain? Because I thought...
Aaargh! Talking to you has made me lose
track of the count completely!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Enough! Do not speak to me again.
Now farewell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Wait! There's a huge cliff right—

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Oh wow. I did NOT see that coming.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
It's finished! It's finally complete!
A blade with the perfect combination of
flexibility and strength, and a temper
pattern that simply ripples with life! As a swordsmith, this blade will
surely be my masterpiece!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: All that remains is to give it a name worthy of its majesty. I hereby dub thee...Darkblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You sure that's a good name?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Darkblayde, huh? I like it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You there! What is your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Naming something is like granting it a soul.
I think you should take that responsibility
a little more seriously.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You think I don't know that!? Oh, but fine. I'll try again. I hereby dub thee...Deathblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You sure that's a good name?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Deathblayde, huh? I like it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: NOW what's your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I mean, if it's supposed to be an EVIL sword,
then I guess that's fine in, like, a generic
sort of way. But I really think you could
do better if you tried.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Oh? Hmm. Perhaps so. In that case, I hereby dub thee...Dreadblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You sure that's a good name?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Dreadblayde, huh? I like it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Are you even putting any thought into this?
Because it sounds like you're just flipping
through a really cheap thesaurus.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UUUUUUP!
I don't even care anymore!
I'm done thinking of names!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Aw! He smashed it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
This was supposed to be my masterpiece,
and now I can't even stand to look at it!
Get out of my sight, damn you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Yeah, sounds good to me.
Better luck next time.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Darkblayde Hideyoshi!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Darkblayde it is, then! Also,
I might be overthinking this, but...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Deathblayde Ieyasu!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Deathblayde it is, then! Also,
I might be overthinking this, but...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Dreadblayde Nobunaga!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Dreadblayde it is, then! Also,
I might be overthinking this, but...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I am suddenly overcome with an urge
to put this sword's edge to the test...
And your ripe flesh will do nicely!
Bwa ha! Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Mm-hm. I had a feeling this
is where we were headed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: What... What have I done!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
How about I hold on to that sword for you,
okay? Don't worry, I'm sure your next one
will be your REAL masterpiece!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh man, where the heck am I?
...Huh? There's someone here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Waaaaaah! Waaaaaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: What's wrong?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I fell into the sea and was swallowed
by a giant fish and I wanna get out
of here... Waaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, we're inside a FISH!?
Gross! I'm getting outta here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's burn stuff to make smoke!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's bash whatever we can!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's just stay calm and patient.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
There's a bunch of stuff over there that
looks flammable. What do you say we
grill this fish from the inside?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
And when the fish coughs out the smoke,
we take the opportunity to get away!
Gee, ma'am! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I'll light the fire with magic.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh man, it's really burning!
Now we just need to bide our time.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh no, ma'am! Look over there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I've got no idea what that is,
but it sure looks dangerous.
New plan! Douse the blaze!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: I can't, ma'am! It's too big!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: BWAAAAAAH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
If we just start bashing whatever we can,
the fish'll spit us out to be rid of us.
Attack the walls, the floor, whatever!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Gee, ma'am! You sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's get nuts!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Is it working, ma'am?
Did the fish open its mouth?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Not yet! Man, this dumb fish
is way tougher than it looks...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh no, ma'am! There are fiends
coming at us from further down!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
So this fish swallowed
a bunch of fiends, too?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
This thing has to open its mouth
at some point, so let's just sit back
and wait for nature to happen.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
You want to SIT, ma'am?
Gee, I dunno...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: *yawn* I'm getting a little drowsy.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I guess it wouldn't hurt
to rest for a bit...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Whoa! I think I dozed off there.
I hope we didn't miss an opportunity.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey, wake up, sleepyhead!
Knock knock, anyone home?
...Huh? He's not moving.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh my gosh, he MELTED!
His whole body MELTED!
He must have been digested
while we were sleeping!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Speaking of, I'm feeling a little
itchy and uncomfortable myself...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: BWAAAAAAH! I'M MELTING TOOOOOO!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
Look at that! The fish
opened its mouth!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
That brawl must have been too
much for it. Quick, let's escape!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Perfection! Now that our new security
mech is ready, the city will be safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
You there! Madam! I'm sorry, but could you
help me activate this mech? I don't happen
to have a free hand at the moment.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: What do you want me to do?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Do you see a lever and switch?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Sure, they're right here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, pull the lever down.
Next, press the switch three times.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, press the switch two times.
Next, lower the lever and press the switch once.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Lever, switch three times, lever.
Got it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Switch twice, lever, switch once, lever.
Got it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Incidentally, as a safety precaution,
any error in the start-up sequence
will cause the unit to self-destruct.
So do be careful, yes?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Why would you design it like that?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
When you have three doctorates, you can
design whatever mech you like. Now begin.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Okay, let's see...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Next...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Pull the lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Push the switch.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Success! It's starting up!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Not sure what that was all about,
but I guess I did good?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Egads, you feckless oaf!
You've just activated the
self-destruct mechanism!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Uh, whoopsie?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: WE'RE ALL GOING TO DIIIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: WHOOPSIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Attention, everyone! If you visit our
department store today, you'll get
a chance to meet our popular new
mascot, Spendy McBigbucks!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Come on! Let's give our customers
a warm welcome, Spendy!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text: How did a fiend get in here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text: Oh, uh, no one. Never mind me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh my gosh, you're late! Don't tell me you forgot that Capitol Cuisine! is airing live today!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We don't have time for this, chef!
Just get in the studio!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ah, there's nothing better than creating your own meals from scratch. Welcome, friends, to a special live edition of...Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with the dough.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with a caramel sauce.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
The names of the ingredients are all there.
Just gotta combine them properly and we're off!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we add the toppings.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we make the custard.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: And now we pop it in the oven.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oooh, I can't wait to try it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh my, that cooked up nicely!
Let's try a little, shall we?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Hurk! Oh man, I'm gonna blow chunks!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Kill the feed! KILL THE FEEEEEED!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: We'll see you all next week on Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Are there really ghosts
in this abandoned house?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Yeah! My brother totally saw one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Hey, what are you guys doing?
Can I play too?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Hey, rude! I'm not a ghost!
I'm a lady—and a cute one, at that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Hey, don't scare us like that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Oh, that? That's just a fiend.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Okay, coast is clear.
The fiend's gone now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
See? I told you there
were ghosts here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: I'm sorry. I believe you now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
You two better run on home.
But be careful!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't listen to her! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Oh man, look! Twins!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
They ain't twins! I was chasin' a dangerous
alien, but I took my eye off it for a second
and it shapeshifted into a goddamn civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now I can't tell 'em apart!
Which one do I shoot?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: What!? Don't ask ME!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Um... Maybe shoot 'em both?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn it! I was so close to
gettin' the dirtbag—AND
to my retirement!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
How dare you point your gun
at a civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm filing an official complaint!
I'll have your badge!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Aw, that's a shame.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The hell did you say!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm saying it doesn't really matter.
If you shoot 'em both, then boom!
You got your alien.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Are you out of your goddamn mind!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, if you're squeamish or something,
I'll just kill 'em with my magic.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: No, stop! I'm human, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this some kind of joke!?
You can't be serious!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: I'm always serious.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
This chick is out of her mind...
Well, there's no way I'm
going down without a fight!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: There's the culprit!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm glad you were able to
apprehend the real alien.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn, lady! You sure had me going
with that ruse of yours!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Ruse...? Oh, riiight! Yeah, that was
all a ruse. Ha ha ha! Got you good!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Maru's my kitty! But I accidently left
a window open and he ran away.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Aw, I'm so sorry to hear— Wait.
There's a cat right over there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Hold on! Maru looks scared.
He must be terrified to be
outside for the first time.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
I'm sorry! I didn't mean for
that to happen, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Just like that. Niiice and slooow.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Okay, we're in close, but Maru
still looks pretty spooked.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
I'm sorry! I didn't mean for
that to happen, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: See? He's a lot more relaxed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: You can pick him up now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text: Uh, am I inside someone's body?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Red Panther here: I've arrived at the
heart. Moving to eliminate the target.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Sorry, pal. It's just business.
Nothing personal.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Are you seriously planning
to attack that heart?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
My briefing didn't say anything about another
agent. Unless... Aw, hell! Don't tell me the
president's people caught wind of our plans!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
I have zero idea what
you're talking about.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Doesn't matter! Get out of the way
unless you wanna be put on ice!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
I still don't know what any of that was about,
but at least I was able to protect...
Er, whoever this is.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
Thank you. When I stumbled across those
fiends, I thought I was a dead man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
As a merchant, allow me to repay your
kindness with a reward of your choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
You want me to get water?
But how!? From where!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I guess I was too late.
Oh, that's terrible.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I just got some water from
that merchant, so here you go!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Impede me not, vile fiends! I must deliver 
this message from the king forthwith,
and my duty shall not be denied!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
My heartiest thanks, blessed angel!
I am ever in your debt!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Sure hope that messenger makes it
to wherever he was going.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Fie! To think I might be ensnared by more
fell fiends with the castle near in sight! 
But the peril is no matter; this warning
must reach the king at any cost!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Again!? My debt to you deepens
all the more, my glorious angel!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: I'm pretty deep in the woods here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: Then why don't YOU hunt it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
So that's how it is, hm?
Then you leave me no choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Seriously? You're siccing
some fiends on me!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, don't be so cross! Look, I'll even
give you a potion to compensate.
Which would you like, mmm?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I was bitten by this horrid snake earlier!
I didn't think it was serious, but the
thing turned out to be venomous,
and now I'm going to DIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, you don't look so good.
Oof! And you're burning up!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Nooo! I'm too pretty to die!
You have to run and get a doctor!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Aw, don't worry! It's a cinch to cure
this sort of thing with magic!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text: Huh? Why isn't my magic working?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Aw, don't worry! It's a cinch to cure
this sort of thing with magic!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Whaaat!? It didn't work at all!?
Well, looks like I'll have to use
that antidote I got earlier.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text: I was in such pain but...it's like it never happened!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Well no wonder my magic didn't work!
I don't think that was the bite of a
snake at all!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Wow, that's quite a storm.
Bad night to be on the deck of a ship.

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Ho there, landlubber!
Lend a hand!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
The ship took a real hit from the storm,
and we've lost both a sailor and a
treasure chest overboard!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
If we don't pull 'em both up fast,
they'll be at the bottom of the sea!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, we pulled up the treasure.
So next we should...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! We're too late!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Thank you... You saved my life...

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
And now for the treasure!
Uh... Where'd it go?

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! It took the treasure!

SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_AMYA_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, at least your friend's okay.
Let's call that a win!
